      • TextBlobBuilder

        public TextBlobBuilder()
        Constructs empty TextBlobBuilder. By default, TextBlobBuilder has no runs.
        See Also:
        https://fiddle.skia.org/c/@TextBlobBuilder_empty_constructor

    • Method Detail

      • build

        @Nullable
public @Nullable TextBlob build()

        Returns TextBlob built from runs of glyphs added by builder. Returned TextBlob is immutable; it may be copied, but its contents may not be altered. Returns null if no runs of glyphs were added by builder.

        Resets TextBlobBuilder to its initial empty state, allowing it to be reused to build a new set of runs.

        Returns:
        SkTextBlob or null
        See Also:
        https://fiddle.skia.org/c/@TextBlobBuilder_make

      • appendRun

        public TextBlobBuilder appendRun​(Font font,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 float x,
                                 float y)
        Glyphs are positioned on a baseline at (x, y), using font metrics to determine their relative placement.
        Parameters:
        font - Font used for this run
        text - Text to append in this run
        x - horizontal offset within the blob
        y - vertical offset within the blob
        Returns:
        this

      • appendRun

        public TextBlobBuilder appendRun​(Font font,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 float x,
                                 float y,
                                 @Nullable
                                 @Nullable io.github.humbleui.types.Rect bounds)

        Glyphs are positioned on a baseline at (x, y), using font metrics to determine their relative placement.

        bounds defines an optional bounding box, used to suppress drawing when TextBlob bounds does not intersect Surface bounds. If bounds is null, TextBlob bounds is computed from (x, y) and glyphs metrics.

        Parameters:
        font - Font used for this run
        text - Text to append in this run
        x - horizontal offset within the blob
        y - vertical offset within the blob
        bounds - optional run bounding box
        Returns:
        this

      • appendRun

        public TextBlobBuilder appendRun​(Font font,
                                 short[] glyphs,
                                 float x,
                                 float y,
                                 @Nullable
                                 @Nullable io.github.humbleui.types.Rect bounds)

        Glyphs are positioned on a baseline at (x, y), using font metrics to determine their relative placement.

        bounds defines an optional bounding box, used to suppress drawing when TextBlob bounds does not intersect Surface bounds. If bounds is null, TextBlob bounds is computed from (x, y) and glyphs metrics.

        Parameters:
        font - Font used for this run
        glyphs - glyphs in this run
        x - horizontal offset within the blob
        y - vertical offset within the blob
        bounds - optional run bounding box
        Returns:
        this

        public TextBlobBuilder appendRunPosH​(Font font,
                                     short[] glyphs,
                                     float[] xs,
                                     float y)

        Glyphs are positioned on a baseline at y, using x-axis positions from xs.

        Parameters:
        font - Font used for this run
        glyphs - glyphs in this run
        xs - horizontal positions on glyphs within the blob
        y - vertical offset within the blob

      • appendRunPosH

        public TextBlobBuilder appendRunPosH​(Font font,
                                     short[] glyphs,
                                     float[] xs,
                                     float y,
                                     @Nullable
                                     @Nullable io.github.humbleui.types.Rect bounds)

        Glyphs are positioned on a baseline at y, using x-axis positions from xs.

        bounds defines an optional bounding box, used to suppress drawing when TextBlob bounds does not intersect Surface bounds. If bounds is null, TextBlob bounds is computed from (x, y) and glyphs metrics.

        Parameters:
        font - Font used for this run
        glyphs - glyphs in this run
        xs - horizontal positions of glyphs within the blob
        y - vertical offset within the blob
        bounds - optional run bounding box
        Returns:
        this
